com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli
Interface AuthorizedOnly

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAuthorizedOnly, CheckGithubTokenCommand, CloneCommand, CommitCommand, DeployCommand, HistoryCommand, MaintenanceCommand, RevertCommand, StatusCommand, UndeployCommand, UpdateCommand
public interface AuthorizedOnly

The interface to implement in order to tell CadmiumCli instance that the command that implements this interface should be authenticated in the Github API. The AbstractAuthorizedOnly class should be extended as it already has implementations of each of the methods required by this interface and provides helper methods that can be used in authentication purposes.

Author:
John McEntire

          Tells the CadmiumCli instance that this command should silence the authentication and just fail if not authorized.

          Sets the Github API token for the current instance.

isAuthQuiet

boolean isAuthQuiet()
Tells the CadmiumCli instance that this command should silence the authentication and just fail if not authorized.

Returns:
true if the authentication should not prompt for a username and password.
